00037 
00038 typedef QMap< int, std::string > MorkDict;
00039 typedef QMap< int, int > MorkCells;                                     // ColumnId : ValueId
00040 typedef QMap< int, MorkCells > MorkRowMap;                      // Row id
00041 typedef QMap< int, MorkRowMap > RowScopeMap;            // Row scope
00042 typedef QMap< int, RowScopeMap > MorkTableMap;          // Table id
00043 typedef QMap< int, MorkTableMap > TableScopeMap;        // Table Scope

00045 // Mork header of supported format version
00046 const char MorkMagicHeader[] = "// <!-- <mdb:mork:z v=\"1.4\"/> -->";
00047 
00048 const char MorkDictColumnMeta[] = "<(a=c)>";

00052 {
00053         NoError = 0,
00054         FailedToOpen,
00055         UnsupportedVersion,
00056         DefectedFormat
00057 };

00063         DictTerm,
00064         GroupTerm,
00065         TableTerm,
00066         RowTerm,
00067         CellTerm,
00068         CommentTerm,
00069         LiteralTerm
00070 };
